Instruction: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add chopped onion, carrot, celery, and garlic. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Sprinkle flour over vegetables, stir to coat. Cook for 1 minute.
Gradually whisk in vegetable broth and milk until smooth. Bring to a simmer and cook until thickened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in frozen peas and dried thyme. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Roll out one pie crust and place in a 9-inch pie dish. Pour filling into crust.
Roll out remaining pie crust and place over filling. Crimp edges to seal.
Brush top crust with beaten egg.
Cut a few vents in the top crust.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until golden brown and filling is bubbly.
